title: Confessing a Pornography Problem
itunes:author: Guests: Nick & Michelle Stumbo
itunes:summary: Hiding a pornography problem from your spouse is like inviting a tornado to tear through your relationship. If left unchecked, the consequences can leave permanent damage. Greg, Erin and John give some tips for confessing a pornography problem. Receive the book Setting Us Free with your gift of any amount!
